name: Turbo Slam Dunk Unleashed
description:
Turbo Slam Dunk Unleashed is a local multiplayer basketball game. You compete against your opponent in a 3 minutes street basketball game ! Ever been board during long lessons/lectures ? If you got friends (and computer) boredon will be no more !

Default keys are in options menu, and of course you can change them , just hit enter to start mapping.

How to play:
Score points to win , final score = points - fouls. You did a foul if you didnt throw a ball when you jumped. Use hit (default ctrl/spacebar) to take the ball form the opponent. Ctrl/spcaebar to throw the ball if you have it. Hold it to throw stronger/further. If you slam the ball mid-air you gain ability to dunk.M to toggle music.

In game settings every player choses his character then presses throw to lock it. When 1st player selected the character , he can chose the map ( only 1 to chose from so far) and again select it by hitting throw button.

Have fun and feel free to leave any feedback !
